PI Xuecao Li

Education

2012.09 - 2016.03 Ph.D., Ecology,Tsinghua University, China.
2008.09 - 2012.07 B.S., Geographical Information Science, Sun Yat-Sen University, China.


Employment

2020.10 - Now Professor, China Agricultural University, China.
2016.04 - 2020.06 Postdoctoral research, Iowa State University, U.S.


Research Interests:

  • - Urbanization and sustainable development
  • - Remote sensing of land-use and land-cover change
  • - Theory, method, and modeling of urban growth
  • - Nighttime light applications
  • - Vegetation phenology and climate change
